Package ca.concordia.dao

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.concordia.dao.Map
  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Map class contains the details of the:
    1.list of continents in a map.
    2.list of countries in a map.
    3.list of borders in a map.
    The main feature of this class in that it checks the adjacency between the countries which is required in Graph class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Map()
      Constructor generates an empty list with an initial capacity of ten for storing:
      1.Continents.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Graph getAdjacencyMatrix()
      This method shows the adjacency between the countries and returns the connected graph.
      Graph getContinentSubGraph​(java.lang.String p_ContinentName)
      This getter method checks for the passed Continent Name in the Array List of Continents and saves the corresponding continent ID for the matching strings.
      java.util.List<Border> getListOfBorders()
      This method shows the details of borders present in a map.

      This method shows the details of continents present in a map.

      This method shows the details of countries present in a map.
      Territory getTerritoryByName​(java.lang.String p_Name)
      This getter method is used to find the continent p_Name corresponding to argument passed as territory

      This method sets the list of continent by implementing Border class.

      This method sets the list of continent by implementing Continent class.

      This method sets the list of continent by implementing Continent class.

      • getListOfContinents

        public java.util.List<Continent> getListOfContinents()
        This method shows the details of continents present in a map.
        Additionally, returns the list of continents present in a map.
        Returns:
        d_ListOfContinents the list of continents

      • setListOfContinents

        public void setListOfContinents​(java.util.List<Continent> p_ListOfContinents)
        This method sets the list of continent by implementing Continent class.
        Parameters:
        p_ListOfContinents - initialising the continents in the list.

      • getListOfCountries

        This method shows the details of countries present in a map.
        Also, returns the list of countries present in a map.
        Returns:
        d_ListOfCountries the list of continents

        This method sets the list of continent by implementing Continent class.

        p_ListOfCountries - initialising the countries in the list to this method.

      • getTerritoryByName

        public Territory getTerritoryByName​(java.lang.String p_Name)
        This getter method is used to find the continent p_Name corresponding to argument passed as territory
        Parameters:
        p_Name - Territory p_Name is passed as an argument
        Returns:
        l_Continent

      • getAdjacencyMatrix

        public Graph getAdjacencyMatrix()
        This method shows the adjacency between the countries and returns the connected graph.
        Returns:
        graph showing adjacency.

      • getContinentSubGraph

        public Graph getContinentSubGraph​(java.lang.String p_ContinentName)
        This getter method checks for the passed Continent Name in the Array List of Continents and saves the corresponding continent ID for the matching strings.
        Parameters:
        p_ContinentName - It is of type string and is used to compare the Continent name from the list of Continents
        Returns:
        l_Graph ContinentSubGraph is returned in l_Graph
